name: Ext_R3_MedicationDispense_su_responsibleParty
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.MedicationDispense.substitution.responsibleParty for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationDispense.substitution.responsibleParty from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationDispense|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Who is responsible for the substitution
element.definition: The person or organization that has primary responsibility for the substitution.
element.comment: `MedicationDispense.substitution.responsibleParty` maps to R5 `MedicationDispense.substitution.responsibleParty`. Changed from an array to a single value (max cardinality from * to 1). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
